19  package net.heroicefforts.viable.android.dist;
20  
21  import java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler;
22  import java.lang.ref.WeakReference;
23  
24  import net.heroicefforts.viable.android.Config;
25  import android.content.Context;
26  import android.util.Log;
27  
28  /**
29   * This class handles linking Viable's exception handling to client applications.  Users that want to be have their
30   * crashes reported by Viable should invoke {@link register} from within their main Activity or Service.
31   * 
32   * @author jevans
33   *
34   */
35  public class ViableExceptionHandler implements UncaughtExceptionHandler
36  {
37  	private static final String TAG = "ViableExceptionHandler";
38  	
39  	private WeakReference<Context> activityRef;
40  	private UncaughtExceptionHandler parent;
41  	
42  	
43  	/**
44  	 * Registers a client activity or service so that exceptions will be reported by Viable.  Registration will not replace the
45  	 * existing exception handler, but chain to it upon completion.<br/>
46  	 * <br/>
47  	 * This call is the only direct code call required by Viable clients.<br/>
48  	 * <br/>
49  	 * Calls to this method are idempotent.
50  	 *  
51  	 * @param ctx your main service or activity.
52  	 */
53  	public static void register(Context ctx)
54  	{
55  		Context oldCtx = null;
56  		UncaughtExceptionHandler oldHandler = Thread.getDefaultUncaughtExceptionHandler();
57  		
58  		if(oldHandler instanceof ViableExceptionHandler)
59  			oldCtx = ((ViableExceptionHandler) oldHandler).activityRef.get();
60  		
61  		if(oldCtx == null)
62  		{
63  			if(Config.LOGD)			
64  				Log.d(TAG, "Original ExceptionHandler:  " + Thread.getDefaultUncaughtExceptionHandler());
65  			Thread.setDefaultUncaughtExceptionHandler(new ViableExceptionHandler(ctx.getApplicationContext()));
66  		}					
67  	}
68  	
69  	private ViableExceptionHandler(Context ctx)
70  	{
71  		activityRef = new WeakReference<Context>(ctx);
72  		parent = Thread.getDefaultUncaughtExceptionHandler();
73  	}
74  	
75  	/**
76  	 * Invoke Viable to handle exception reporting, if available on the client's phone.
77  	 */
78  	public void uncaughtException(Thread thread, Throwable ex)
79  	{		
80  		Context ctx = activityRef.get();
81  		
82  		if(activityRef.get() != null)
83  		{ 
84  			String appName = ctx.getApplicationContext().getApplicationInfo().loadLabel(ctx.getPackageManager()).toString();			
85  			if(Config.LOGD) 
86  				Log.d(TAG, "Exception in app '" + appName + "'.");
87  			BugReportIntent intent = new BugReportIntent(appName, ex);
88  			ctx.sendBroadcast(intent);
89  			if(Config.LOGD) 
90  				Log.d("ExceptionHandler", "Storing bug context.");
91  		}
92  		else
93  		{
94  			if(Config.LOGD) 
95  				Log.d(TAG, "Context was already collected.  Could not report exception.");
96  		}
97  		
98  		if(Config.LOGD) 
99  			Log.d(TAG, "Parent:  " + parent);
100 		if(parent != null)
101 			parent.uncaughtException(thread, ex);
102 
103 	}
104 
105 }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
